awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Based on the John Irving novel, this film chronicles the life of T S Garp, and his mother, Jenny. Whilst Garp sees himself as a "serious" writer, Jenny writes a feminist manifesto at an opportune time, and finds herself as a magnet for all manner of distressed women.

title: The World According to Garp
